title: The Devil's Bible
description: The vampire Romeo and Juilet.The Devil's Bible is a haunting fiendish re-telling of the greatest love story of all time.Sophie Fielding and her younger sister Ellie, are forced to move in with their deadbeat father, after their mother's death.But not everything in the dismal town of Wove is dull, after glimpsing the boy of her dreams Sophie makes it her mission to claim him, at any cost.However she soon learns that the object of her affection, and his family, are hiding a dark secret.A secret that could endanger everything Sophie holds dear...
author: Holly Vane
